ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: last weekend when we cleared VP, after each fight tons of people noticed faction hits while the weekend before only a handful, 6 or so, noticed.  an officer
ygData.messageBody:
last weekend when we cleared VP, after each fight tons of people noticed
faction hits while the weekend before only a handful, 6 or so, noticed. an
officer asked whoever got a faction hit to say "yes" in guildchat and there
were 26 yes's. after that trip i went from Warmly to Threateningly, pretty
much everyone else is KOS or close as well. unfortunately it's just not an
issue anymore if you wanna fight there. like you said, it's only a matter
of time =)

Shada

> Hrrm didn't know they changed size of hate list. I guess that
> explains why
> last nuke to hit doesn't get kill most of the time anymore.
> =) I've survived
> quite a few fights, but for some reason haven't taken faction
> hits most of
> the time. I am still warmly (or kindly I forget) to Kunark dragons. I
> specifically remember standing under Silverwing and watching
> Alloria get the
> killshot (of all people a cleric) while I was grouped with
> her. No faction
> hit whatsoever. Later I definitely got a hit from Phara Dar,
> but I am still
> not KoS. Only a matter of time I'm sure.
>
> Sartori{Legion}
